rooms.name: Entrance Lobby and Reception Area

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A flexible space adjacent to the living area with a large dining table. Decor includes reclaimed wood and vintage accents, maintaining an organic flow in line with Vastu principles by not obstructing energy paths.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact modern kitchen equipped with open shelving and a central island for social cooking. Placed towards the north to harness positive energy as per local norms.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated fitness space featuring mirrored walls, equipment storage, and natural ventilation; designed following Vastu guidelines with proper alignment for optimum energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: The largest bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a balcony. Decorated in rich textures and layered drapes with Bohemian accents; placed towards the east to welcome positive energies.

rooms.name: Balcony/Laundry Area
